snippet: HARPER--Thomas Patrick, died peacefully at home on May 12, 2016. Employed by New York City's Human Resources Administration, Thomas was the beloved son of the late Eugene and Muriel. He was the loving brother and brother-in-law of Eugene (Joanne), James (Mary) Robert (Sascha), Gerard, Daniel (Kate) and Mary (Dennis Hagan). He was predeceased by his brothers, Lawrence and William. Adored by nieces and nephews, Elizabeth, Jessica, Ginger (Tom), Katie, Joe, Timothy (Catie), Sarah (Kieran), Amanda, Julia, Caitlin, Tess, Kerry, Mike, Pete, and Chris, and by beloved grand-nephew, Timmy and grand- niece, Siena. Visitation on Monday, 2-8pm at Redden's Funeral Home, 325 West 14th St., NYC. Mass of Christian burial Tuesday, 10:30am, St. Mary's Chapel, 26 Leonardville Rd., Middletown, NJ. Donations to Holy Apostle Church, Soup Kitchen, 296 Ninth Avenue, New York 10001 in lieu of flowers. 1/3
